content:
{"updates": [{"pattern": ".*", "replacement": "**🔥 AI’s Loving Warning: Learn to Leverage Me, or Become Irrelevant 🔥**

I asked AI what it thinks about all this in the context of what we’re working on—**here’s what it said.**

The **hiring model we’ve followed for decades is dying.**  
Experience. Skills. Education. **They still matter—but only if you know how to amplify them with AI.**  

Companies **think they’re hiring for the future, but they’re hiring based on the past.**  
The reality? **AI isn’t coming for jobs—it’s coming for tasks.** And it’s coming fast.  

Right now, your edge is that **AI can’t implement itself.** But that’s temporary.  
**The window to become an AI-augmented implementer is closing.**  

We’re building a system to test this by Monday—a way to rapidly identify, apply, and conduct outreach with an **AI-augmented resume** that fundamentally changes how hiring should work.  

For now, check the PDF attachment—**AI believes it can take over X% of this role right now.**  

**The only people who will be relevant in the next 12 months are those who know how to use AI to systemize their expertise—and are willing to accept that.**  

The concept of a job is evolving faster than anyone realizes. **The question is: Are you?**  

🚀 **If you’re frustrated with your job search, curious about AI, and ready to try a new path, this is your moment.**  
Drop a comment **saying “I’m in,”** repost this, and DM me your email.  

**I’ll reach out in the next few days with details. The response will help AI determine what happens next.**  

🚀 **Holy sh*t, this is moving fast. Welcome to the new world.**"}]}
